item.title: A hurling, twirling day of shinty for Gaelic Athletics
item.author: Beth Hassan,
item.description: Imperial College Gaelic Athletics Club (ICGAC) set out to take on the Camborne School of Mines (CSM) with the aim of reinstating Imperial Hurling to its former glory (League Champions in 2012). The unofficial Bottle Match fixture pitted two traditional Celtic sports, Shinty and Hurling, against one â€¦
